article_title: Biden and Netanyahu's deepening rift on public display
sentence: At  its  core  is  the  spiralling  number  of  civilians  killed  and  a  humanitarian  crisis  in  Gaza,  where  the  UN  warns  that  more  than  half  a  million  people  -  a  quarter  of  the  population  -  is  on  the  brink  of  famine.
